audioText: L'ampleur de ce tour de force intellectuel dépasse tout ce que le bout de ses doigts agiles avait pu concevoir jusqu'alors, ouvrant des perspectives inédites.
question: What exceeded the creator's previous conceptions?
options: The scope of this intellectual feat surpassed anything conceived before
The technical complexity of the implementation process
The financial resources required for completion
The time needed to achieve the desired results
explanation: The text states 'L'ampleur de ce tour de force intellectuel dépasse tout ce que le bout de ses doigts agiles avait pu concevoir jusqu'alors, ouvrant des perspectives inédites' - The scope of this intellectual feat exceeds everything that the tip of his agile fingers had been able to conceive until then, opening unprecedented perspectives. This targets 'tour' and 'bout' in an intellectual achievement context.
